name: Beer Pong
description:
New for 2015: Beer Pong, the classic party sport is now available in a completely revamped version for modern Android devices!

Compete against your own high score or challenge a friend in the two player mode. The game controls are simple and fun. Just hold and swipe on the screen to throw the ball!

Full 3D graphics, realistic game physics and a catchy soundtrack make Beer Pong the perfect casual game on Android. Play now!

Feature set:

- Two game modes: Single and two player mode
- 12 different levels in single player mode
- Two types of control mechanisms: touch based and trackball based (for older Android devices)
- Realistic physics
- 3D graphics
